name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Maybe I should explain that I forwarded this video because I like the atmosphere in the video, that's all. There is no special event, it's just young people spontaneously gathering together to sing. I am moved by the fact that singing unites people in this atomized society. Some things transcend ideology and region. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @PlayApex I suggest you replace this crappy vibrator with a rat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
Further decoupling?
From April 1, many foreign universities will no longer be able to access some CNKI databases.
Including China's doctoral dissertation full-text database, China's outstanding master's degree thesis full-text database, China's important conference paper full-text database, China's legal knowledge resource database and China's statistical yearbook database.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 29, New York, more than 200 protesters held a protest outside the hotel where Tsai Ing-wen was staying.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: You may have noticed that the above WeChat screenshot is full of information about "parades", "protests", "demonstrations" and time and place, which can be spread freely in WeChat groups without being automatically blocked by the system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The School of Foreign Languages of Qilu Normal University forced students to buy clothes during the sports meeting, but two days after paying the money, they claimed that buying clothes was voluntary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
Anti-fraud APP also has internal competition? A Chongqing netizen submitted that his class issued a requirement to register the "Qianjiang Anti-Fraud Guardian APP" and required the selection of a specific police station among the units in the jurisdiction. It is suspected to be a derivative of the national anti-fraud APP, but no more relevant information about the product can be found on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Some netizens found that using this poster of the Ukrainian athlete who was killed as the cover of the WeChat Moments would be blocked.
Earlier, at the 2023 International Fencing Federation Women's Epee World Cup in Nanjing, Ukrainian athletes tried to display this poster but were blocked by staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: What would happen if Hengshui and Beijing had the same college entrance examination paper?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On March 29, Beijing Golden Shield Publishing House issued a statement saying that there was no administrative affiliation or labor relationship between the publishing house and Li Xuezheng. The original "Golden Shield Film and Television Center" has been revoked.
On March 30, the China Radio and Television Social Organization Federation issued a statement to remove Li Xuezheng from the position of vice chairman of the committee.
Afterwards, it was suspected that Li Xuezheng himself responded in the circle of friends that he was persecuted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Several netizens submitted articles saying that they received an emergency notice to stop submitting newspapers from the People's Daily on March 30, and that the newspapers that had been stopped from being submitted would be sealed and destroyed on site. The reason is currently unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 30, Hainan fully launched preparations for the island-wide customs closure. After that, the entire island of Hainan will become a "domestic and foreign" area. Experts say that Hainan will be built into a "Hong Kong + Florida" style free trade port.
